# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe will significantly enhance the value and functionality of your business operations. Given its exceptional quality and capabilities, I understand its true worth to be $15,000. However, I am offering it to you today at an exclusive price of $12,000. This is an opportunity not to be missed, considering the substantial benefits this product can bring to your endeavors. I look forward to discussing how we can make this valuable asset yours. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $12,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $12,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $15,000
